meanings.definition: Begin or cause to begin again.
meanings.sent1: She reinitiates her workout routine every Monday.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reinitiates the lesson after the interruption.
meanings.sent3: The cat reinitiates its nap every time someone enters the room.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise reinitiates the day with its warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The rain reinitiates the growth of the flowers in the garden.

meanings.definition: Start or cause to start again.
meanings.sent1: He reinitiates the game by pressing the reset button.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic reinitiates the engine to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: The baby reinitiates its giggles when tickled.
meanings.sent4: The music reinitiates memories of happy times.
meanings.sent5: The chef reinitiates the cooking process after adding more ingredients.
